results.title: SHORT syndrome in two Chinese girls: A case report and review of the literature
results.text_hl: Additionally, in terms of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ control, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ works well in the early treatment stage.

citations.NLM: Zhang Y, Ji B, Li J, Li Y, Zhang M, Ban B. SHORT syndrome in two Chinese girls: A case report and review of the literature Mol Genet Genomic Med. 2020 Sep;8(9):e1385. PMID: 32602265

results.title: Early-Onset Diabetes Mellitus in Chromosome 8p11.2 Deletion Syndrome Combined With Becker Muscular Dystrophy - A Case Report
results.text_hl: Physical examination revealed the @<m>DISEASE_Thakker_Donnai_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536503 @@@dysmorphic facial features@@@, and broad and foreshortened @DISEASE_Preaxial_Hallucal_Polydactyly @DISEASE_MESH:C566632 @@@halluces@@@.

citations.NLM: Cao C, Wang X, Zhao X. Early-Onset Diabetes Mellitus in Chromosome 8p11.2 Deletion Syndrome Combined With Becker Muscular Dystrophy - A Case Report Front Endocrinol (Lausanne). 2022;13():914863. PMID: 35957837
